arts.ttl: Álvarez scores late to give Atletico Madrid 1-0 win over Celta Vigo
arts.sum: Atletico remains two points behind second-place Madrid going into Sunday’s match at Atletico’s Metropolitano Stadium. Álvarez poked home a cross by Antoine Griezmann to give Diego Simeone’s team the win in Vigo.

arts.ttl: Madrid derby: Real Madrid 'set' for double injury boost against Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: Real Madrid allegedly expect to have both Dani Carvajal and Eduardo Camavinga available for Sunday's Madrid derby against Atletico Madrid.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid icon issues warning to Atletico Madrid ahead of derby showdown
arts.sum: Real Madrid make the short trip to the Civitas Metropolitano on Sunday as they prepare to take on Atletico Madrid in the first Madrid derby of the 2024-25 campaign. arts.ttl: Former Barcelona, Atletico Madrid and Arsenal starlet retires aged 34
arts.sum: Former Arsenal, Barcelona and Atletico Madrid starlet Fran Merida has called time on his career at the age of 34, after leaving Lugo this summer. Once dubbed the next big thing in Spanish football after Cesc Fabregas, Merida made 390 appearances in his 16-year career. arts.ttl: Real Madrid receive injury boost ahead of Atlético clash
arts.sum: La Liga giants Real Madrid have on Thursday been afforded some altogether positive news on the personnel front. This comes amid confirmation that a key member of the club’s backline…

arts.ttl: “I had to experience it” – Julian Alvarez on why he swapped Manchester City for Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: Julian Alvarez shocked many by leaving Manchester City during the summer, and it was also somewhat of a surprise that it was Atletico Madrid that he ended up at. However, for him it was a no-brainer. arts.ttl: Source: Mbappé to miss 3 weeks with thigh injury
arts.sum: Real Madrid have confirmed that Kylian Mbappé suffered an injury to his left thigh during Tuesday's win over Alavés.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid sweating on Kylian Mbappe ahead of Madrid derby after injury scare
arts.sum: Real Madrid have been left sweating ahead of their derby against Atletico Madrid on Sunday after Kylian Mbappe was forced off against Alaves with a thigh problem - with the player set to undergo tests
